title: [Ta'Illistim, Aaendarein Gaer]
description: The gaer meanders along the edge of the cliffs, providing secure footing despite its narrowness.  Little is visible of the landscape below, save the occasional twinkling lantern light from wagons or torch carried by a traveling party.

The gaer meanders along the edge of the cliffs, providing secure footing despite its narrowness.  The view from the gaer is magnificent, covering the Gyldemar Forest to the east all the way to the Black Forest far southward.
